DashboardPage.description: Your personalized dashboard to guide you in providing the best care.
DashboardPage.intro: Here you can find your learning modules, track your progress, and run simulations to practice your skills.
DashboardPage.learningPathErrorMessage: There was an error fetching your personalized learning path. Please try again later.
DashboardPage.practiceScenariosDescription: Hone your skills with real-world simulations.
DashboardPage.practiceScenariosIntro: Test your decision-making in a safe, controlled environment.
